summary: The Weasleys as this me or my brother have said
title: The Weasleys as this me or my brother have said
body:
Ginny: That was so lame, it was as lame as—damnit I can’t think of anything

Ron: Why so much vegetarian food?! I want my BEEF!

Fred: Quick! Get the sauce!

George: I’m tying to make my bed, but the bed’s too big and it’s COnfuSinG!

Percy: STOOOOOPPPP!

Charlie: Why would I live in the real world when in my fantasies there are dragons?

Bill: Fuck this shit, I’m gonna go live in Alaska and be a pirate!

Molly: I’m TRYING to be the responsible one but you’re messing it all up!

Arthur: How am I supposed to work this when I can’t even work that and it’s all so disorienting and I’m gonna DiE

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

Blaise: You can't just throw things into the closet!
Draco: We just need to let Hermione see it. She's a savant at...
body:
Blaise: You can’t just throw things into the closet!

Draco: We just need to let Hermione see it. She’s a savant at organising.

Blaise: Very unlikely she’ll manage this mess.

Draco: Did you know everything in her apartment has a label? Even her label maker has a label ‘label maker’

summary: Harry Potter characters as dumb things me and my friends have said
body:
Harry Potter characters as dumb things me and my friends have said

Harry: I swear if I have another used condom on my desk again guys,

Ron: I will now henceforth quit school and become a non-sex prostitute

Hermione: But if you look at it in a certain way, closing the goddamn door would make no sense because he was trying to expose the groom’s bride?

Draco: I tried eyeliner once for a wedding and I went from feeling like Gerard Pique to looking like Gerard Way, and lemme tell you it was hot.

Ginny: Having brothers is like being on a constant period; painful and a completely unnecessary use of a perfectly fine organ. Also, it makes you need a lot of therapy.

Remus: Kids these days always have such violent game formats. What’s wrong with a good old go on the Wii. Vive la Wiida!

Neville: I took art this year and I’m not sure whether being allergic to paint is going to be an issue or not.

Sirius: I wonder if werewolves find other canines attractive when they transform. Just a hypothetical question, obviously…

James: When I play sports, somehow I feel like the ball is family. It’s like it’s my homophobic cousin who I want to hurl across a field.

Lily: I hate to kill your vibe but being able to quote high school musical in every conversation doesn’t make my blood bob to the top.

Peter: In eight years I’ll probably be dead for disobeying my evil mastermind boss. Either that or I’ll be a child’s birthday entertainment.

McGonagall: I hate you all but I’m the only one allowed to do that without being run over by a zamboni

Dumbledore: I could tell you where the remote is, or I could tell you that I love you and would never keep any secrets from you, ever.

summary: “About ten minutes later, four broomsticks came swooping down out of the darkness. They all helped buckle Norbert safley into...
caption: “About ten minutes later, four broomsticks came swooping down out of the darkness. They all helped buckle Norbert safley into the harness and then Harry and Hermione shook hands with others and thanked them very much. At last, Norbert was going… going… gone. ”

reblog.comment: “About ten minutes later, four broomsticks came swooping down out of the darkness. They all helped buckle Norbert safley into the harness and then Harry and Hermione shook hands with others and thanked them very much. At last, Norbert was going… going… gone. ”

blog.name: ask-gayharrypottercharacters
blog.description:
[MATURE & SHIPCEST]
Hogwarts students, Witches and Wizards from the Marauders' Era, Death Eaters: they're all queer and here to answer your most indiscreet questions.

title: Draco/Harry
body:
Drarry drabble written by @ordinarylittleme

Harry Potter is a symbol to many people. A symbol of courage and strength, of friendship and loyalty, of the battle of good versus evil, of triumph over adversity. (Or, to the Death Eaters, a symbol that they’ll lose their lives soon.) To Draco, however, he is a symbol of hope. Because when they’re together like this, with Potter’s head buried in the crook of his shoulder and lips pressed to his skin, Draco can believe that there still remains some sort of hope for himself. (Though there’s growing evidence that he doesn’t..) Hope that he’s no longer the boy who never questioned his parents, that he isn’t the spiteful and hateful child he once was, that he isn’t the bully of his youth. Hope that, maybe, he can be human again. They never share more than a few cursory meaningless words, and they always stay hidden in the darkness, curtains drawn shut and lights extinguished. The wards are up and nobody comes close. Chapped lips pressed to bare, sweaty skin, muscled legs entangled together with the sheets, soft sighs and softer groans, scrabbling fingers and digging nails. A dark secret, one they never acknowledge outside of this room. But Harry Potter is The Boy Who Lived, a noble hero, and Draco can tell himself that means something. Because Harry would never waste his time with somebody who is beyond saving. He just doesn’t. Draco has to believe that, because then he can think: maybe, just maybe, he is worth redemption after all. It’s a pleasing thought.

trail.content:
Drarry drabble written by @ordinarylittleme

Harry Potter is a symbol to many people. A symbol of courage and strength, of friendship and loyalty, of the battle of good versus evil, of triumph over adversity. (Or, to the Death Eaters, a symbol that they’ll lose their lives soon.) To Draco, however, he is a symbol of hope. Because when they’re together like this, with Potter’s head buried in the crook of his shoulder and lips pressed to his skin, Draco can believe that there still remains some sort of hope for himself. (Though there’s growing evidence that he doesn’t..) Hope that he’s no longer the boy who never questioned his parents, that he isn’t the spiteful and hateful child he once was, that he isn’t the bully of his youth. Hope that, maybe, he can be human again. They never share more than a few cursory meaningless words, and they always stay hidden in the darkness, curtains drawn shut and lights extinguished. The wards are up and nobody comes close. Chapped lips pressed to bare, sweaty skin, muscled legs entangled together with the sheets, soft sighs and softer groans, scrabbling fingers and digging nails. A dark secret, one they never acknowledge outside of this room. But Harry Potter is The Boy Who Lived, a noble hero, and Draco can tell himself that means something. Because Harry would never waste his time with somebody who is beyond saving. He just doesn’t. Draco has to believe that, because then he can think: maybe, just maybe, he is worth redemption after all. It’s a pleasing thought.

blog.name: wolfstarmarauders
blog.title: Sirius LupinXRemus Black
blog.description:
✨ Orion is the star of a hurt can ✨

In dog years I'm dead

people think that the werewolf howls at the moon, but he is howling at the star he loves the most

body:
Severus Snape Isn’t A Hero

Severus Snape is an idiot, I don’t want that shit argument is a hero, because he isn’t.

How the hell can a hero be a man who sabotaged another man from his own side?

Snape finishing the prisoner of Azkaban by spreading the rumor that Remus was a werewolf, doing that not only left Dumbledore with a member of the Order of the Phoenix less at Hogwarts, but left Remus Lupin out of Hogwarts.

Imagine how it was for Remus to have to leave Hogwarts, the place where he grew up, outside Muggle criticism or what the Wizards thought of the wolf.

A job for which I have the certainty that Remus worked hard and in which the most precious moments of his life had taken place.

The place where James and Lily were alive. The place where Sirius was not in Azkaban.

All this was for Severus Snape, the hero.
